impact.title: Our Global Impact
impact.subtitle: Tracking our progress in artisan empowerment, cultural preservation, and environmental sustainability.

sustain1.desc: 100% of our packaging is made from recycled materials and is fully biodegradable.

sustain2.title: Tree Planting Program
sustain2.desc: For every purchase, we plant trees in regions where our artisans live and work, helping to restore local ecosystems.

sustain3.title: Carbon-Neutral Shipping
sustain3.desc: We offset 100% of the carbon footprint from shipping through verified carbon offset projects.
